member.summary: The max time a request is allowed to take

Add all the exchange clients to the service collection as well as the IExchangeRestClient, IExchangeSocketClient and IExchangeOrderBookFactory aggregation interfaces
member.param: The service collection
The options to be applied for each exchange client. Can be overridden by providing exchange specific options.
The options options for the Binance rest client. Will override options provided in the global options
